scene.name: travel
scene.line: Yeah. They're traveling and they want to go home. It's dark and raining, and they don't know where to go, but they're not scared. Do you think they'll figure it out?
scene.option: Maybe not. But they'll figure `something` out.

scene.name: home
scene.line: Yeah. They're singing about their home because they're lost right now. It's a scary song.
scene.option: It's scary, but they can still sing about it.

scene.name: hard-times
scene.line: Yeah. Everybody has it pretty rough right now. Even if you just want to go home, you'll have problems. Like it'll be too dark and you'll get scared.
scene.option: It's hard sometimes, but things have a way of working out.
Maybe you can just stay lost in the dark. Maybe you'll be OK with that eventually.

scene.name: positive-ending
scene.line: Dr. Truman's going to help your friend. He'll be OK.

scene.name: negative-ending
scene.line: Your friend's in pretty bad shape, isn't he?
